content: you can find the free pattern in my website https //littleloveeveryday com/crochet-daisy-flower-pattern/ crochet daisy flower pattern by a little love everyday this pdf pattern is written in us crochet terms and is available in english skill level easy the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - double_crochet - half_double_crochet - triple crochet - increase - invisible decrease - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch materials you will need dk weight cotton yarn in the main color yellow and green 3 mm crochet hook polyester fiberfill for stuffing tapestry needle stitch marker scissors >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but kindly credit me as the designer and include a link to this pattern >> kindly note this is a pdf pattern with step-by-step instructions and pictures of a free pattern that is available on my website to view the free pattern kindly visit www littleloveeveryday com
